I worked as an Angular frontend engineer building the new interactive payment process user interface that powers invoicing, installment payment, virtual card management, and payment with Stripe API and Insurance plan.

I worked as a full-stack engineer in a remote distributed team to build Andela’s in-house Cab booking Slack bot and web application. I also worked with Andela Partners as an integral part of their tech team to build innovative solutions.
I build a fintech pension application that helps pension owners carry out banking transactions like fund transfer, utility bills transactions at the comfort of their homes.
I redesign the company website to a new and more responsive design and build the company's client's website.

educations.degree: Bachelor of Science in Economics and Statistics

blogs.title: How to Build Web APIs with NestJS, Postgres, and Sequelize - A Beginner's Guide
blogs.body: NestJS is an MVC framework for building efficient, scalable Node.js server-side applications. It is built with and fully supports TypeScript (yet still enables developers to code in pure JavaScript). It also combines elements of Object Oriented Programming, Functional Programming, and Functional Reactive Programming...

blogs.title: How to use the addScope() method in Sequelize
blogs.body: Sequelize scoping allows you to define commonly used queries that you can easily use later. Scopes are defined in the model definition and can be finder objects, or functions returning finder objects...

blogs.body: If you are a beginner in the software development ecosystem, chances are you can’t wait to start developing badass web apps, mobile or desktop apps...
